message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find immensely valuable. Given its unique features and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you see in it, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1,300,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product goes beyond $900,000. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects a fair price for both of us.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. While I understand the value you place on the product, I must stick to my budget. I would like to counter your offer at $1,000,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can move forward with the transaction.
